snippet: The social blogging site has hired a content executive and a Newsweek writer to document the service and market it to users.
abstract: Social blogging site Tumblr names Chris Mohney as editor in chief and Jessica Bennett as executive editor; part of their duties will be to document the service and market it to users on the Web site's staff blog and on a separate part of tumblr.com that has not been set up yet.
lead_paragraph: The social blogging site has hired a content executive and a Newsweek writer to document the service and market it to users.

headline.seo: Tumblr Hires Writers to Cover Itself
headline.main: Blogging Site Tumblr Makes Itself the News
headline.print_headline: Blogging Site Tumblr Makes Itself the News
